EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_451PivotalPushesBoundariesWithGPDB5_AR_Q317.Download
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for downloading Pivotal Pushes Boundaries with Latest Version of Greenplum Database
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the 451 Research report, Pivotal Pushes Boundaries with Latest Version of Greenplum Database. We hope you found it informative and helpful.
For more analyst resources related to Pivotal data solutions check out:
- Website: Pivotal Greenplum <[[https://pivotal.io/pivotal-greenplum]]> - eBook: Data Warehousing with Greenplum: Open Source Massively Parallel Data Analytics <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/data-warehousing-with-greenplum]]> - Analyst Report: Gartner Critical Capabilities for Data Management Solutions for Analytics <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/gartner-critical-capabilities-for-data-management-solutions-for-analytics]]>
- White Paper: Pivotal Greenplum 5: The Next-Generation Data Platform <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/pivotal-greenplum-5-the-next-generation-data-platform]]> - Case Study: Conversant - Reinventing Digital Marketing <[[https://pivotal.io/customers/conversant]]> - Webinar: Analytical Innovation: How to Build the Next Generation Data Platform Webinar <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/analytical-innovation-how-to-build-the-next-generation-data-platform]]>
- Webinar: Five Pitfalls When Operationalizing Data Science and a Strategy for Success Webinar <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/aug-2-operationalizing-data-science-five-common-pitfalls-and-a-strategy-for-success]]>
- Webinar: Microservices Approaches for Continuous Data Integration Webinar <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/microservices-approaches-for-continuous-data-integration]]>
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization in transforming the way it builds software, please contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team For more on everything from Spring to cloud-native to accelerating your application development and more, please join us at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-confirmation-discount-2018]]>, taking place this September 24-27th in Washington, D.C. Use code S1P_Discount_100 <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-confirmation-discount-2018]]> and save $100 off the price of admission.
